title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 125.4 - Education equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 125.4 - Education equipment

State Regulations
(a) Indoors. Learning centers in a classroom shall include areas for block
building, housekeeping, water play, creative arts, painting and clay and
collage, science and nature study, cooking and music. There shall be adequate
books and pictures, puzzles, games and small manipulative materials. (b) Outdoors. Outdoor equipment shall include
permanent, well-anchored structures for climbing and dramatic play. There shall
be movable equipment, wheel toys, tricycles, wagons, trucks, building
equipment, ladders, sawhorses and a shed or area to store this
equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8

125.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
